column4: can someone help me please. i wana dual boot my windows 7 and linux. i see windows 7 in the grub boot menu but when i select it, it does nothing
can someone help me please. i wana dual boot my windows 7 and linux. i see windows 7 in the grub boot menu but when i select it, it does nothing
go back into ubuntu and in a terminal type sudo update-grub2 then reboot and try selecting win7 again
pastebin the output from sudo fdisk -l
look at the output from fdisk... sdb1 has a problem....
what does that problem mean?
sdb1 is running into sdb2... its a windows thing....
what do u mean? sdb1 is a 100mb with the windows 7 launcher. but i think i accidentally selected that drive to put the linux boot loader on it
i have the win7 disk yes
it should boot to a recovery mode... recover it, then reinstall grub...
ok ill try that now then. thanx
hey are you still here? the windows startup repair cant repair it :(
try a super grub disk
see if itll boot
madch33z3 may be able to walk you thrugh win7 recovery with ya disk
can i install grub with the super grub cd?
no but it should get you into it....
so then how can i reinstall grub once i fix win7?
if madch33z3  can help you it would be best
thats easy
not a problem...
madch33z3 may help you
